empty: No participants found for the current filters
title: Participants

pending.public: You will be able to join this event by getting an invitation again or by applying to it before {maxRegistrationDate}.
pending.private: Since this event is private, you will only be able to rejoin if you get invited again.

description.ongoingHtml:
You won't be able to rejoin since this event is already started.

Your tile completions will still count for your team, but all your pending completion requests will be canceled.

kick.label: Kick from event
kick.title: Kick {username} from the event?

description.ongoingHtml:
They won't be able to rejoin ince this event is already started.

Their tile completions will still count for their team, but all their pending completion requests will be canceled.

pending.private: Since this event is private, they will only be able to rejoin if you invite them again.
pending.public: They will be able to join this event again by getting an invitation or by applying to it before {maxRegistrationDate}.
pending.publicWithDateHtml: They will be able to join this event again by getting an invitation or by applying to it before {maxRegistrationDate}.

kick.success: You have kicked {username} from the event

transferOwnership.label: Transfer ownership
transferOwnership.title: Transfer ownership to {username}?
transferOwnership.descriptionHtml:
They will be promoted to Owner and you will be demoted to Organizer.

This action cannot be undone.
